<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Viper](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3200)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Each member of this family of venomous snakes has long, hinged fangs that inject potent venom into their prey. Different vipers inject different types of venom, which might result in paralysis, extreme pain and swelling, blood clotting, or even the sudden stopping of the victim's heart.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=43)): DC 13

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 8
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature -1">[Viper](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3200)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Tiny" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=531" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 316 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Perception** +5; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=69), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=74) ([imprecise](/Rules.aspx?ID=412)) 30 feet

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +5, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +1, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +5, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +3

<row gap="medium">
**Str** -3

**Dex** +4

**Con** +0

**Int** -4

**Wis** +1

**Cha** -2
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 14 

**Fort** +2 

**Ref** +7 

**Will** +5 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 8

</row>

**Slink** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** A creature ends its movement adjacent to the viper or within the viper's space; **Effect** The viper Strides, [Climbs](/Actions.aspx?ID=2374), or [Swims](/Actions.aspx?ID=2381) up to 10 feet (or up to the relevant Speed, if that Speed is less than 10 feet). It must end its movement in a location that isn't within 5 feet of a foe. This movement doesn't trigger reactions.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet, climb 20 feet, swim 20 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fangs +6 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [reach 0 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 1d8–3 piercing plus viper venom

**Viper Venom**  ([Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) **Saving Throw** DC 16 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 4 rounds; **Stage 1** 1d8 poison damage (1 round)

</column>
